metadata.title: CVE-2019-19060 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the adis_update_scan_mode() function indrivers/iio/imu/adis_buffer.c in the Linux kernel before 5.3.9 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption), akaCID-ab612b1daf41.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
